segments.source_content:
---
slug: /199
title: "This Week In React #199: shadcn, Next.js, TanStack, Remix, MDX, Astro, Storybook, @svg-use, MSW, RAG, RN-WebGPU, React-Three-Fiber, Re.Pack, Super Apps, RN-macOS, EAS, Node.jx, Stage 2.7, AggregateError, Style-Observer..."
authors: [matthieugicquel, cyrilbo]
date: 09-04-2024
---

translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
みなさん、こんにちは！

segments.source_content: Cyril and Matthieu from [Theodo Apps (formerly BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact) here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from the React and React Native worlds.

translations.ja: [Theodo Apps（旧BAM）](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact)のCyrilとMatthieuです 👋。Sebに代わって、ReactとReact Nativeの最新ニュースをお届けします。

segments.source_content: This week, shadcn has released a new CLI, and we've noticed other nice things that are currently cooking, like support for the `use()` hook in React Query.

translations.ja: 今週は、shadcnが新しいCLIをリリースし、React Queryでの`use()`フックのサポートなど、現在進行中の素晴らしい機能にも注目しています。

segments.source_content: The React Universe Conf starts tomorrow, we're expecting React Native announcements that we will discuss next week!

translations.ja: React Universe Confが明日から始まります。来週はReact Nativeに関する発表について議論する予定です！
@@untranslatable_placeholder_6429a3aa

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.ja: **💡 [このニュースレターをTwitterでチェック](https://slo.im/thread) - ビジュアルフォーマット 🎨**
@@untranslatable_placeholder_fcd52337
@@untranslatable_placeholder_42e34e45
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}

[![\[ライブワークショップ\] Next.jsのデバッグ例付き](/emails/issues/199/sentry.jpg)](https://sentry.io/resources/faster-apis-better-experiences/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=tracing-fy25q3-fasterapiworkshop\&utm_content=newsletter-Danworkshop-rsvp)

**[\[ライブワークショップ\] Next.jsのデバッグ例付き](https://sentry.io/resources/faster-apis-better-experiences/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=tracing-fy25q3-fasterapiworkshop\&utm_content=newsletter-Danworkshop-rsvp)**

segments.source_content: Join us on September 15th for a hands-on workshop with Dan Mindru, co-host of the Morning Maker show, where he'll share how he shaved 22.3 seconds off an API call using Sentry. You'll pick up practical tips on how to debug errors and performance issues using Sentry’s Tracing and Session Replay—RSVP to save your spot.

translations.ja: 9月15日に開催されるDan Mindru氏（Morning Makerショーの共同ホスト）によるハンズオン・ワークショップに参加しましょう。Dan氏はSentryを使用してAPIコールを22.3秒短縮した方法を共有します。SentryのTracingとSession Replayを使ってエラーやパフォーマンス問題をデバッグする実用的なヒントを学べます。RSVPで参加予約をしてください。
## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![Shadcnが新しいCLIを導入](/emails/issues/199/shadcn.jpg)](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/changelog)
**[Shadcnが新しいCLIを導入](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/changelog)**

segments.source_content: It’s significantly more powerful and flexible:

translations.ja: 大幅にパワフルで柔軟になりました：

segments.source_content:
* `shadcn add` can now install components, themes, hooks, utils, dependencies…
* It supports for multiple React frameworks (Next.js, Remix, Vite, Laravel)
* It can update your tailwind config instead of overriding it
* Components can be imported directly from urls

translations.ja:
* `shadcn add` でコンポーネント、テーマ、フック、ユーティリティ、依存関係などをインストール可能
* 複数のReactフレームワーク（Next.js、Remix、Vite、Laravel）をサポート
* Tailwind設定を上書きせずに更新可能
* コンポーネントをURLから直接インポート可能
詳細は 🐦 [このTwitterスレッド](https://x.com/shadcn/status/1829646528149143992) をご覧ください。

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [React Component Analytics — Omlet Scans Your Codebase to Measure Component Usage to Increase Code Quality and Design Systems Adoption](https://omlet.dev/?utm_campaign=partner_this-week-in-react_newsletter-quick-link-aug-2024)
* 👀 [TanStack Query PR - Add support for `React.use()`](https://github.com/TanStack/query/pull/7988): React Query plans to return a promise that you can `use()`, making it easier to integrate with Suspense in a performant way. It’s more convenient than `usePrefetchQuery` and more parallel than `useSuspenseQuery`.
* 👀 [Remix Route Convention Evolution](https://github.com/brookslybrand/route-convention-evolution): The new `routes.ts` we evoked last week will allow you to skip filesystem-based routing, or simplify using the convention of your choice.
* 🐦 [Next.js 15 may be released soon](https://x.com/feedthejim/status/1829569083777437745) without waiting for React 19 to be stable, and without requiring React 19 for the pages router. It will include major Turbopack improvements.
* 🐦 [Render on Fetch vs Fetch on Render](https://x.com/t3dotgg/status/1829988532489793957): Theo shares a graphical visualization of different React rendering patterns. An associated video is available to deep dive.
* 📜 [Introducing @svg-use](https://fotis.xyz/posts/introducing-svg-use/): Greatly explains how SVG-in-JS (notably SVGR in React) is convenient for theming and distribution, but is not ideal in terms of performance and duplication. The `<use href>` pattern is a good alternative but requires manual plumbing, so the author created a toolchain to automate it.
* 📜 [Build-time Components](https://codehike.org/blog/build-time-components): Greatly illustrated article explains the benefits of React Server Components for MDX users looking to make their content interactive. Client components and build-time Remark/Rehype plugins have limitations, and RSCs offer the best of both.
* 📜 [Using Server Functions and TanStack Query](https://www.brenelz.com/posts/using-server-functions-and-tanstack-query/): TanStack Start is almost ready to use, and has a compelling data fetching approach, with “server fns” integrated with react-query and routing (for prefetching), fully typesafe of course.
* 📜 [What the heck is atomic state management?](https://www.frontendundefined.com/posts/monthly/jotai-atomic-state-management/): A refresher on how to use Jotai “the right way” and the benefits it brings.
* 📜 [Component testing in Storybook](https://storybook.js.org/blog/component-testing/): Storybook promotes component testing as a complement to end-to-end testing, offering speed and reliability with browser fidelity for better UI test coverage.
* 📜 [The Complete Developer Guide to React 19:](https://www.callstack.com/blog/the-complete-developer-guide-to-react-19-part-1-async-handling) A 2-part series on what’s coming in React 19, including useTransition, useActionState, useOptimistic, use, Server Components, Server Actions, ref as a prop, Diffs for Hydration Errors, Improved error reporting, Context as a provider, useDeferredValue initial value & more.
* 📜 [Easy RAG for TypeScript and React Apps](https://edspencer.net/2024/9/2/easy-rag-for-typescript-and-react-apps): Build a RAG system in TypeScript and React by processing text documents, generating embeddings, and utilizing a vector database for semantic search to answer user queries.
* 📜 [Blending Markdown and React components in NextJS](https://edspencer.net/2024/8/28/using-markdown-with-nextjs)
* 📜 [Higher Order Components (HOCs) in React: What They Are and How To Use Them](https://www.reactsquad.io/blog/higher-order-components-hocs-in-react)
* 📜 [Comprehensive React Testing: Handling API Calls with Mock Service Worker](https://www.trevorlasn.com/blog/react-testing-mock-service-worker/)
* 📜 [Using the inert attribute in React](https://www.mayank.co/notes/inert-in-react)
* 📜 [Authoring CSS in modern JavaScript apps](https://www.alexchantastic.com/modern-css-authoring)
* 📦 [Midday V1 - Starter kit based on Next.js, Turborepo, Shadcn & more](https://github.com/midday-ai/v1)
* 📦 [Bulletproof-React - scalable React architecture repo - now updated with Next.js examples](https://github.com/alan2207/bulletproof-react)
* 📦 [Astro 4.15 - Astro Actions, Use rewrites for i18n fallbacks, libSQL remotes in @astrojs/db, Timeout option in client:idle, Swap helpers for ViewTransitions](https://astro.build/blog/astro-4150/)
* 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Build anything with v0 (3D games, interactive apps)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zA-eCGFBXjM)
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - Using AI Structured Output with NextJS & React](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Rb4SpWRHC8)

translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_95729a46
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}

segments.source_content: [![Run GitHub Actions up to 2x faster at half the cost](/emails/issues/199/blacksmith.jpg)](https://blacksmith.sh/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=classified\&utm_campaign=sep-4\&utm_term=react)

translations.ja: [![GitHub Actionsを最大2倍高速化、コスト半減で実行](/emails/issues/199/blacksmith.jpg)](https://blacksmith.sh/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=classified\&utm_campaign=sep-4\&utm_term=react)

segments.source_content: **[Run GitHub Actions up to 2x faster at half the cost](https://blacksmith.sh/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=classified\&utm_campaign=sep-4\&utm_term=react)**

translations.ja: **[GitHub Actionsを最大2倍高速化、コスト半減で実行](https://blacksmith.sh/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=classified\&utm_campaign=sep-4\&utm_term=react)**

segments.source_content: Blacksmith runs your GitHub Actions substantially faster by running them on modern gaming CPUs. Integrating Blacksmith is a one-line code change. 100+ companies like Ashby, GitBook, Superblocks, and Slope use Blacksmith to help developers merge code faster.

translations.ja: Blacksmithは、最新のゲーミングCPU上でGitHub Actionsを実行することで、大幅な高速化を実現します。導入は1行のコード変更のみ。Ashby、GitBook、Superblocks、Slopeなど100社以上がBlacksmithを採用し、開発者のコードマージを迅速化しています。
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
[![React Universe](/emails/issues/199/react-universe.jpg)](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/)

segments.source_content: At the time we’re writing this, the React Native Core Contributor Summit is happening in Wrocław.

translations.ja: この記事を書いている時点で、React Nativeコアコントリビューターサミットがヴロツワフで開催中です。

segments.source_content: It will be followed by the React Universe conf on Thursday and Friday. A lot of exciting talks are planned, and [you can follow along on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ). Some highlights: A new debugger, The New Architecture, Expo DOM Components, Static Hermes.

translations.ja: その後、木曜日と金曜日にはReact Universeカンファレンスが開催されます。多くの興味深い講演が予定されており、[YouTubeで視聴可能です](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b48Lax2-jOQ)。ハイライトとして、新しいデバッガー、New Architecture、Expo DOM Components、Static Hermesなどが挙げられます。

segments.source_content: So we will probably have more React Native news for you next week!

translations.ja: そのため、来週はさらに多くのReact Nativeニュースをお届けできるでしょう！

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [React Native Mastery - The only course you need to Master React Native & Expo](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir\&utm_medium=email)
* 👀 [Re.Pack is adding support for Rspack](https://github.com/callstack/repack/pull/720): The alternative, webpack-compatible bundler for React Native will probably see major speed gains with this change.
* 🐦 [React Native IDE will integrate Storybook into IDE's preview mode](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1829262449541062716)
* 🐦 [React Three Fiber running on react-native-webgpu](https://x.com/aarongrider/status/1830629528005460016): We’ve seen examples of Three.js running with react-native-webgpu. Aaron Grider from SpaceX is currently working on React Three Fiber support, bringing its declarative API to React Native land.
* 📜 [Create and run fast end-to-end tests using Moropo and Expo: with Maestro](https://expo.dev/blog/create-and-run-fast-end-to-end-tests-using-moropo-and-expo)
* 📜 [How to Develop a Super App with React Native?](https://medium.com/@xayilmaz/how-to-develop-a-super-app-with-react-native-fe18fbe002c5): Use of a custom native module for communication between mini-apps differs from the Repack approach, which leverages Webpack to generate modular and independent JavaScript bundles for each mini-app.
* 📖 [Expo documentation update](https://x.com/amanhimself/status/1828545129499750498): Local First Architecture, DOM Components, Native project upgrade helper for SDK 51.
* 📖 [Expo Application Services (EAS) Pricing](https://expo.dev/pricing#update): EAS Update and Build concurrencies get cheaper as of September 1st.
* 📦 [react-native-macos 0.75](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-macos/v/0.75.2)
* 🎥 [Minute React Native - React Native WebGPU Explained in under 2 Minutes](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQrO2LFnrOw)
* 🎥 [Dan’s Lab - How to build a QR Code Scanner with Expo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PZIEqcdFjpQ)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - Expo DOM Components are Wild](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BWA8KY5QEPk)
* 🎥 [Chain React 2024 - YouTube playlist available](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE7tQUdRKcyb81ybEVsrk6PfxXu7pJs1i#chainreact2024)

translations.ja:
* 💸 [React Native Mastery - React Native & Expoをマスターする唯一のコース](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir\&utm_medium=email)
* 👀 [Re.PackがRspackのサポートを追加予定](https://github.com/callstack/repack/pull/720): React Native向けのwebpack互換バンドラーは、この変更により大幅な速度向上が見込まれます。
* 🐦 [React Native IDEがStorybookをIDEのプレビューモードに統合予定](https://x.com/kzzzf/status/1829262449541062716)
* 🐦 [React Three Fiberがreact-native-webgpuで動作](https://x.com/aarongrider/status/1830629528005460016): Three.jsがreact-native-webgpuで動作する例を見てきました。SpaceXのAaron Grider氏は現在、React Three Fiberのサポートに取り組んでおり、その宣言型APIをReact Native環境に導入しようとしています。
* 📜 [MoropoとExpoを使用した高速エンドツーエンドテストの作成と実行: Maestroを活用](https://expo.dev/blog/create-and-run-fast-end-to-end-tests-using-moropo-and-expo)
* 📜 [React Nativeでスーパーアプリを開発する方法](https://medium.com/@xayilmaz/how-to-develop-a-super-app-with-react-native-fe18fbe002c5): ミニアプリ間の通信にカスタムネイティブモジュールを使用するアプローチは、各ミニアプリ向けに独立したJavaScriptバンドルを生成するWebpackを活用するRepackのアプローチとは異なります。
* 📖 [Expoドキュメント更新](https://x.com/amanhimself/status/1828545129499750498): Local First Architecture、DOM Components、SDK 51向けネイティブプロジェクトアップグレードヘルパー。
* 📖 [Expo Application Services (EAS)の価格改定](https://expo.dev/pricing#update): 9月1日より、EAS UpdateとBuildの同時実行数がより安価になります。
* 📦 [react-native-macos 0.75](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-native-macos/v/0.75.2)
* 🎥 [Minute React Native - 2分でわかるReact Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQrO2LFnrOw)
* 🎥 [Dan’s Lab - ExpoでQRコードスキャナーを構築する方法](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PZIEqcdFjpQ)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - Expo DOM Componentsの驚異](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BWA8KY5QEPk)
* 🎥 [Chain React 2024 - YouTubeプレイリスト公開](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE7tQUdRKcyb81ybEVsrk6PfxXu7pJs1i#chainreact2024)
## 🔀 Other {#other}
